Levels.win: Row signifying the win, occurs after decision phase if participant guessed correctly.
Levels.loss: Row signifying loss, occurs after decision phase if participant guessed incorrectly.

resp.Description: Orientation of the image that the participant selected.

Levels.left: The participant chose the left image.
Levels.right: The participant chose the right image.

gender.Description: Gender of image selected by participant

Levels.M: The image selected was of a male
Levels.F: The image selected was of a female

image_left.Description: Relative path of stimulus image file.

image_right.Description: Relative path of stimulus image file.
